{"id":1297206495,"question_id":3475,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3Â days","timestamp":1719107747,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1297206495/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Binary Array Elements Equal to One I","memory":"57.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minOperations(int[] nums) {\n        int count = 0;\n        int n = nums.length;\n\n        for(int i=0;i<n-2;i++){\n            if(nums[i] == 0){\n                nums[i] = 1;\n                nums[i+1]^=1;\n                nums[i+2]^=1;\n                count++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        if(nums[n-1] == 0 || nums[n-2] == 0){\n            return -1;\n        }\n\n        return count;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-binary-array-elements-equal-to-one-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
